law.text:
The Department may deny an application for a permit for a sanitary landfill system to any nongovernmental person if:
The owner of the land, the operator, or the applicant has violated:
Any law of this State or any other state concerning sanitary landfills; or
Any regulation or permit condition of this State or any other state concerning sanitary landfills; or
The Department finds that operation of the sanitary landfill system would harm public health or the environment.
